text: Stayve Jerome Thomas (born September 8, 1980), better known by his stage name Slim Thug, is an American rapper. He was born in Houston, Texas. He first became known as a feature artist on the hit single "Still Tippin'" by rapper Mike Jones. He was also a feature artist on Gwen Stefani's "Luxurious" and the US Billboard Hot 100 number one single "Check on It" by Beyoncé. As of 2020, he has released 12 studio albums. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Slim Thug tested positive to COVID-19. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Already Platinum (2005) *Boss of All Bosses (2009) *Tha Thug Show (2010) *Boss Life (2013) *Hogg Life: The Beginning (2015) *Hogg Life, Vol. 2: Still Surviving (2015) *Hogg Life, Vol. 3: Hustler of the Year (2015) *Hogg Life, Vol. 4: American King (2016) *Welcome 2 Houston (2017) *The World Is Yours (2017) *Suga Daddy Slim: On tha Prowl (2019) *Thug Life (2020) *SDS Vibes (2021) *BIGslim (2022) ==Awards and nominations== MTV Video Music Awards Year Nominated work Award Result 2005 "Still Tippin'" MTV2 Award 2006 "Check On It" Best R&B; Video ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers from Texas Category:Musicians from Houston Category:21st-century American rappers
title: Slim Thug
